profile_positions.description:
Yokohama Off-Highway Tires ( YOHT) specializes in design, development, manufacturing and distributing off-highway tires, and is 100% owned by Yokohama Rubber Company (YRC) , the world’s 7th largest tire company.

As President of EMEA, I am leading a five-year strategy that has achieved rapid success in delivering appreciable and sustainable growth whilst driving a step change in organisational capability and culture.

In a leadership-coaching role, I was hired to turn around the business during a period of crisis, resulting in gaining the European entity back on track, in terms of volumes and ebita as per the 4 years plan.
Another critical deliverable was building an A class leadership team with cohesiveness across functions which help increase share of wallet with customers, in the after-market and original equipment companies (OE).
As a consequence, the company was able to obtain a more sustainable vision of growth with trust and confidence, expanding through business development and new acquisitions.

I was highly focused on new launched products and grew new markets, which are drivers for growth and sustaining profits.
As member of the board driving the next 5 years business plan for EMEA and building strategies to synergies and integrate new business from the group YRC into the company YOHT. 

As a result of my leadership and commitment, I was promoted and awarded as Associate officer in YRC (Japan), also recognized for being a people-oriented leader, a catalyst for personnel’s career development & rise of high potentials.
profile_positions.title: President, EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Promoted to President, I have built the entity across all functions, with A class leadership across from SCM, finance, legal, HR, product management, quality, customer service, IT, marketing and sales, to serve the markets of MEA and APAC with a robust 5 years plan. 

Adding more than 60 plus distributors and developing markets and in more than 50 countries, I’ve launched & built the organisation for the brands in the Indian markets, which was new to the company.

I carefully ensured the execution and deliverables of growth and ebita goals, which were above internal targets, market growth rates and excelled vs. competition performance.

Developed a healthy pipeline of products for the following 5 years, capex approvals, streamlined new processes and systems, transforming into a more sustainable entity.

APAC/MEA entity increased visibility & credibility, increasing customer satisfaction, higher engagement levels with the functional teams and gained brand respect felt across the group, clients and suppliers. As a result, I was promoted to handle the EMEA entity.
profile_positions.title: President MEA & APAC

profile_positions.description:
I directed sales, marketing, NPD and product management across all segments for >40 countries. I launched the EU entity in 2009 and led a large team in Sales, Marketing, Pricing, Business Development, Customer Service and Logistics across eight offices in Europe, Israel and India.

This became the driving force of ATG’s international growth to three plants across the globe, five R&D centres and a distribution network in >160 countries, and established its position as a top-five global player in Agriculture, Forestry, Construction and Industrial tires.

In 2013, ATG was sold by its private equity owners, Warburg Pincus, to KKR, and subsequently sold to Yokohama Tire Company in 2016, delivering a substantial return on investment.
profile_positions.title: Chief of Sales & Marketing – Europe, CIS and Oceania

profile_positions.description:
I led global marketing, communications, product and GTM strategy, as a key member of the senior management team that grew ATG from its early stages to becoming a prominent global player.

Setting the marketing strategy, establishing marketing offices globally, and leading product and GTM planning, I built a high-performing team which enabled significant business growth, and supported major global business activity. This included the successful integration of two acquisitions (Galaxy from US and Alliance from Israel) and ATG’s sale from private equity owners, Warburg Pincus, to KKR.
profile_positions.title: Vice President – Head of Group Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Mahindra International Ltd (MIL) is a subsidiary of the US$15BN Mahindra Group, and a 51:49 JV between Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd (M&M) and International Trucks & Engine Corporation of USA (ITEC).

As Head of Marketing and Product Planning, doubled market share growth and 100% sales volume growth in under two years, whilst increasing contributions by 9% for the Light Commercial Trucks and Buses market across India, overseeing a team that managed pricing, communications, PR, dealer development and product management.

I was an active member of the Shadow Board, an elite team in the M&M Group which analysed and challenged strategy and processes, and produced ground-up recommendations to the M&M board.

profile_positions.description:
Tata Motors Limited is India's largest automobile company, a leader in heavy commercial vehicle manufacture, and part of the $US113BN TATA Group. 

As Brand & Marketing Manager, I developed and implemented a pan-India brand and marketing strategy which enhanced sales across the entire product line of commercial passenger vehicles, overseeing a diverse range of activity, including new product introduction, advertising, co-branding, sales kit development, demonstrations, market research, and pricing.

Subsequently, as Regional Sales Manager for West India, I delivered double-digit increase in market share for the region, outperforming all volume targets, whilst increasing key account customer satisfaction metrics.
profile_positions.title: Regional Sales Manager, West India | Brand & Marketing Manager
